manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welcome to Great Boy store.This game console is a powerful and very interesting game console.It has a large 3.0-inch full color screen, rechargeable lithium battery, micro USB port,direction rocker, hook up to TV ,support 2 players.It has 270 classic games pre-installed. Our consoles are lightweight and compact, so you can easily fit them in your backpack or pockets.As a cool birthday,christmas gift for the kids and adults are really nice.

More Fun And Better Than Ever! Newly designed game console is now brighter then ever with 3 inches color screen. Pre-installed 270 classic retro games, you can basically enjoy all the wonderful 8 bit retro games. The artificial appearance design and buttons layout make you enjoy the game more smoothly.Enjoy in the ocean of games. Specifications Dimensions:L*W*H 6.0*2.8*0.75 inches Pre-installed games: 270 retro games Battery: Rechargeable li-ion battery Players: Support 2 players Charging port: Micro USB Charging time: 1 hours Battery Endurance time: 4-6 hours Material: Non-toxic ABS Plastic

Just Like You Remember! A large number of classic retro games pre-installed (Includes action,puzzle, educational, sports games and more).Inspired by the 80's game classic, the game console will allow you to re-live and share great memories alongside a new generation of kids!

3.0" Color Display This game console comes with a 3.0 inches color display that makes the gaming graphics clearer.Soft backlit display allows children to enjoy playing games whether in bright or dark environments. Rechargeable Built-in rechargeable lithium battery,eliminates the hassle of buying and replacing batteries frequently,entertainment kids convenient parents.Using a standard Micro USB charging interface,compatible with most electronic device adapters.Plug and play with power bank even without a battery installed.Charging 1 hour can play for 4-6 hours. Support Hook Up to TV and 2 Players Connect to your TV via AV out, you can easily enjoy vivid and exciting video games in a big screen.Support TV format:NTSC.Compatible with most TVs.Some games are support 2 player .Some of these games can be played by 2 people at the same time, and some are 2 people in turn. Portable Perfectly sized for children, they can handle the game with ease.Great for children's little hands,making it easy for kids to carry and play with wherever they go.

Surprisingly Beautiful Gift for Kids This game console is perfect for a child's birthday, Christmas or party gift!It will give children a different kind of surprise and they will love this little machine! Package Contains 1 x Game console 1 x User Manual 1 x Gamepad 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV cable Specially designed retail gift box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchase for my Grandson, he just loves it. Lots of game time fun. Easy to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tons of Fun!
reviews.reviewText: To me the star rating should be based on the cost/value you get from an item. Although I received this through Vine, to me it is well worth $30-$40. Don't expect modern graphics or the latest games. However, this does have some classic games from Nintendo and Atari that I really enjoyed: Street Fighter, 1942, Double Dragon, Mortal Kombat 4, Altered Beast, Ninja Turtles, Super Contra, Galaga, and the list goes on.I haven't heard of 75% of the games on here. Not a big deal because there is a huge selection and it gives the opportunity to explore new games. At least half of the games, maybe more, do not have title screens in English, but on these old games it doesn't matter too much after you get into the game play. I did run into one issue. There was a game called "Small Mario", it looked more like some type of slot machine game, but it froze up on me (note: not a hardware issue as I was able to press the return button to go to the home screen) .Overall construction of the device is on the cheap side. My son already scratched the screen and the main plastic housing doesn't seem like it would hold up if dropped.It comes with a controller for two players and AV cables for hook up to a TV . Playing two players on the device's screen is tricky, because it is one of the older screen types that are difficult to view clearly at an angle. Not an issue if plugged into a regular tv though. Despite some of my prior criticism I still give it 5 stars because the amount of fun to be had for the price.Update: After a bit more use I think it's necessary to reduce my original review from five stars to four. The graphics on several games are not actually as good as the original (which isn't saying much on some of the games). It is especially noticeable if you hook it up to a tv . Also, the functionality on some of the games is also not the same as the original. I have noticed this on the fighting games and some of the controls don't work properly. It's still fun, but I personally wouldn't pay more than $25 for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nostalgic But Not What I Anticipated!
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed with this handheld set because not many of the games were in English and I didn't know how to play some of them. The extra controller doesn't work and not all of the buttons worked efficiently on the device when playing some of the games so I couldn't play them properly. I was hoping there would be some recognizable games on it from my childhood but it's mostly what seems to be games designed to copy the originals. I will try hooking it up to a tv to see if there are less glitches, but I'm not feeling too hopeful about it.

reviews.reviewerName: Glasses show 2 clip ons Only one receive not the ones I needed. Return is a big hassle Lable won't print So I paid $1 to have it mailed to me a week ago still not here.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good for younger playersVery crude graphics but fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Handheld Game for Kids
reviews.reviewText: I got this handheld game set for my 9 year old. He absolutely loves it. There are several games that are perfect for his developmental age, the picture quality is actually pretty good, and the sound definitely works. (It is pretty loud but there is a volume adjuster.) I love that this set is rechargeable and we don’t have to worry about having AAA batteries on hand. We have not tried hooking it up to a tv so I’m not sure how accessible that is. My 9 year old and I give it 2 thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is great for keeping kids busy. There’s so many pre-loaded games. Some are not in English, so I’m just kind of guessing what to do, but lots of fun anyway!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super basic and low tech
reviews.reviewText: I was under the impression that this game device was required with a bunch of games. There's only six games on here. My grandson plays with it, here and there, but he's not a big fan. It's just a really basic, cheap feeling toy. Years ago when they came out with the old school looking Atari systems reminiscent if the 80s, those were fun.... Those were much better than this little thing. Idk, I just wasn't really impressed.
